{"id":652912619,"lang":"cpp","time":"1 week, 3 days","timestamp":1646357124,"status_display":"Accepted","runtime":"0 ms","url":"/submissions/detail/652912619/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Champagne Tower","memory":"6 MB","code":"class Solution {\npublic:\n    double champagneTower(int poured, int query_row, int query_glass) {\n        double dp[query_row+1][query_glass+2];\n        memset(dp,0,sizeof(dp));\n        dp[0][0]= poured;\n        for(int i=0;i<query_row;i++){\n            for(int j=0;j<=query_glass;j++){\n               double res=max(0.0,(dp[i][j]-1.0)/2.0);\n                dp[i+1][j]+=res;\n                dp[i+1][j+1]+=res;\n            }\n        }\n        return min(1.0,dp[query_row][query_glass]);\n    }\n};","compare_result":"","title_slug":"champagne-tower"}
